nodes.text: The Complete Guide to Star Tours is a 12-page document that pertains to the Tokyo Disneyland version of the original Star Tours ride. It was published by the Planning Office for Tokyo Disneyland Relations and Panasonic, then known as Matsushita Electric Industrial Co. The guide features pictures and brief descriptions of the many droids found in Star Tours, and a detailed description of the attraction itself. The guide also contains information on the Tomorrowland section of Tokyo Disneyland.
